thread.title: CeeLo Green records new album reveals engagement to girlfriend
thread.title_full: CeeLo Green records new album reveals engagement to girlfriend

title: CeeLo Green records new album reveals engagement to girlfriend
text:
CeeLo Green records new album, reveals engagement to girlfriend 
thestar.com Saturday 24th October, 2015 
CeeLo Green poses for a portrait in Los Angeles. Green is releasing a new album in November and revealed his engagement to his longtime girlfriend, Shani James. 
...
